trends: There have been 41 other sightings in Spokane
There were no other sightings in Spokane on or around June 25th 2012
Summary: it was a cigar shaped ufo
divs: Sighting Detailsthree of us were sitting on my porch talking when a bright light in the sky caught our eye, it was a long and quite large cigar shaped ufo, it was glowing a bright yellow color. Ive never seen anything before with that shape or size. It was traveling at such a fast speed as well. It was such a amazing sight and well never forget it.
